thread.section_title: Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals | smokymtndreams.com
thread.title: Jonathan
thread.title_full: Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals reviewed by Jonathan

author: Jonathan
title: Jonathan
text: Myself and some friends rented a beary nice cabin it was really awesome everything worked and it was just like it was in the pictures it was really clean and we had a wonderful experience. The staff was really nice at the office and they got us checked in early. I will definitely be using colonial properties in the near future and I have also used them before now and was very satisfied then too.
